analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x08bbde874a84d4053bb8b56a87c968f74d1ded67.sol:
	Contract NuevaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x08bbde874a84d4053bb8b56a87c968f74d1ded67.sol#202)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of NuevaToken.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x08bbde874a84d4053bb8b56a87c968f74d1ded67.sol#203) is not in mixedCase
